titles.title: 619 When On The Cross My Lord I See (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When on the cross my Lord I see
Bleeding to death for wretched me
Satan and sin no more can move
For I am all transform'd to love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His thorns and nails pierce
Through my heart
In every groan I bear a part
I view His wounds with
Streaming eyes
But see
He bows His head and dies

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come sinners view
The Lamb of God
Wounded and dead
And bathed in blood
Behold His side
And venture near
The well of endless life is here

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Here I forget my cares and pains
I drink yet still my thirst remains
Only the fountain-head above
Can satisfy the thirst of love

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Oh that I thus could always feel
Lord more and more
Thy love reveal
Then my glad tongue
Shall loud proclaim
The grace and glory of Thy name

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Thy name dispels my guilt and fear
Revives my heart
And charms my ear
Affords a balm for every wound
And Satan trembles at the sound
